member.name: Nguyễn Hoàng Bảo Giang
member.quote: “Một cây làm chẳng nên non, ba cây chụm lại nên hòn núi cao”

member.name: Mai Thị Thúy Hậu
member.quote: “Every struggle in your life has shaped you into the person you are today. Be thankful for the hard times, they can only make you stronger.”
